info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 5:05AM EST until December 19 at 7:58PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Still River at Brookfield. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The river begins to flood roads and parking lots. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 14.5 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Still River Brookfield Flood Stage: 12.0 Observed Stage at Mon 4 am: 10.4 Forecast: Mon 11 am 12.4 Mon 5 pm 14.2 Mon 11 pm 14.5 Tue 5 am 13.9 Tue 11 am 12.9 Tue 5 pm 11.3 &&
